decisions.title: Adopt SDLC-compliant workspace structure
decisions.context: Need a maintainable layout for 35 incremental executions with clear separation of requirements, planning, development, testing, deployment, and project management artifacts.
decisions.problem: Existing flat workspace mixed code and documents, making automation and tracking difficult.
decisions.decision: Adopt SDLC 6-phase structure and relocate code/config accordingly.
decisions.rationale: Maximizes clarity for agents and humans, supports incremental development, and aligns with SDLC best practices.
decisions.tradeoffs: Temporary overhead to update configs and scripts.
decisions.implementationNotes: Updated package scripts, Vite/TS configs, and created per-phase READMEs.
followUpActions: Smoke test npm run dev to validate path changes
